mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (member_id, place_name, title, content, rate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{placeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rate})
mapper.select: SELECT review.id, member_id as memberId, nickname as name, place_name as placeName, title, content, rate, like_cnt as likeCnt, review.last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate FROM review JOIN member ON review.member_id = member.id WHERE place_name = #{placeName} ORDER BY like_cnt DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_subscribe WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND review_id = #{reviewId}
